author: henning
msg: This is a backport from T3.0
It allows the user to query the ServletContext, ServletConfig and
the Application root directly from the Turbine class. It also
cleans the code up a little.
This is basically the first step into plugging Fulcrum into Turbine-2. I
don't want to put more of this into T2.2 before the release but as this
code is not invasive, it is nice to have it in the 2.2 release

author: henning
msg: bump various jars to current versions

author: henning
msg: The /conf Pathes seem to confuse people. Use the /WEB-INF/conf just
as in all the other examples

author: henning
msg: This helped me when I was screwing up one of my tools!
[ And it is nice to get Error reporting, too. :-) ]
